name: regression-curator
label: Regression Curator
description: Runs a regression test between curated projects and the QAF
author: NACC

blacklist_file.description: Plain-text file containing the NACCIDs to blacklist from regression testing, one per line

s3_qaf_file.description: S3 URI to QAF file to use as the baseline (required)

s3_mqt_file.description: S3 URI to MQT file to use as the baseline

keep_fields.description: Comma-deliminated list of additional fields to retain from the QAF aside from NACC* and visit date information

filename_patterns.description: Filename patterns to match on; comma-deliminated for multiple patterns

error_outfile.description: Output file to write regression errors to

apikey_path_prefix.description: The instance specific AWS parameter gearbot path prefix

debug.description: Whether or not to use debug-level logging (level set to DEBUG)
